column2:
['Job Description We are looking for a Senior Mobile Developer to join the team. The individual should be young, creative, business & technology savvy and proactive with exceptional communication, managerial and interpersonal skills.
If you care about code quality as much as you care about user privacy, you should fit right in. This role is an opportunity to have an immediate impact while working closely with a talented team to solve challenging problems and ship new features to millions of users.
Main Responsibilities
Design and build Ree-Pay applications
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define, design, and ship new features.
Work with outside data sources and API’s.
Unit-test code for robustness, including edge cases, usability, and general reliability.
Support the entire application lifecycle (concept, design, test, release and support)
Continuously discover, evaluate, and implement new technologies to maximize development efficiency.', 'Your Skills and Experience Must have
Deep knowledge of React Native/Flutter (cross platform) and extensive familiarity with the mobile framework.
5+ years of mobile application development.
Experience being the architect of major new enhancements.
Experience with developing user friendly UI/UX.
Experience working with remote data via REST and JSON
Proficient knowledge on git version control
BS/MS degree in Computer Science, Engineering or a related subject
 Nice to have
Experience with java/Android or swift/IOS is a plus.
Capable of communicating effectively.', "Why You'll Love Working Here Benefits:
Attractive salary (depends on experience)
Bonus package (up to $3000)
Personal Health Insurance
International working environment
13th month salary
Opportunity to gain experience in the attractive fintech industry
Bike parking
Always receive support from team if have personal issues
Access to network of mentors and talents"]

column5: Ree-Pay is a financial technology company and one of the first Buy Now Pay Later (BNPL)
